meanings.definition: relating to or characterized by anisogamy
meanings.sent1: The anisogamous organisms have distinct gametes.
meanings.sent2: The anisogamous species reproduce through the fusion of dissimilar gametes.
meanings.sent3: The anisogamous creatures were like puzzle pieces coming together.
meanings.sent4: In nature, anisogamous relationships often involve a dance of diversity.
meanings.sent5: The concept of anisogamous reproduction can be fascinating to study.

meanings.sent1: Their anisogamous behavior led to unique mating rituals.
meanings.sent2: The anisogamous organisms displayed distinct reproductive patterns.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to observe the anisogamous creatures trying to find their perfect match.
meanings.sent4: The anisogamous nature of their interactions added a layer of complexity.
meanings.sent5: The anisogamous characteristics of the species were evident in their courtship rituals.

meanings.definition: having different gametes of different sizes or forms
meanings.sent1: The anisogamous species had gametes of varying sizes.
meanings.sent2: Anisogamous organisms produce gametes that differ in shape and size.
meanings.sent3: It was funny to see the anisogamous cells trying to fit together like puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent4: The anisogamous gametes were like pieces of a complex biological puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The anisogamous nature of their reproduction was visually striking.
